timeline.message: Reduce dependency on concrete types in PendingTrace and ContinuableScope

timeline.bodyText: Wasn't introduced in this PR but this is common throughout this code base. this must not escape constructors because there are no guarantees about what state the object is in until the constructor exits. IMO a clean up of this class should address this problem.
